SettlingIn/speak Robin "你好！你就是@吧。#$b#我叫罗宾，是这里的木匠。是镇长刘易斯派我来送你去你的新家的。他本人已经在那里为你打扫屋子了。#$b#农场就在那边，跟我来吧。"/viewport move 0 2 800/move Robin 0 5 2 true/pause 800/move farmer 0 4 2 true/fade/speed farmer 2/viewport -200 -200/changeLocation Farm/halt/warp Robin 78 17/faceDirection Robin 3/warp farmer 79 17/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 70 16 clamp/viewport move -1 0 4000/move Robin -8 0 3 farmer -8 0 3/pause 700/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "这里就是%farm农场。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 94/jump farmer/startJittering/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/showFrame 0/stopJittering/pause 800/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 200/speak Robin "怎么了？#$b#虽说是长满了杂草，但是下面的泥土可是很肥沃的！#$b#只要有点耐心，肯定很快就能清理干净它的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/move Robin -7 0 0 farmer -7 0 0/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "……铛铛铛铛，这就是你的新房子了。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 64 15/pause 1500/speak Lewis "啊，新来的农夫到了！$h"/move Lewis 0 1 2/move Lewis 1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 600/speak Lewis "欢迎！我叫刘易斯，是星露谷的镇长。#$b#你不知道，很多人都对你很好奇。#$b#因为这里很少有人搬进来的，所以你瞬间成了大家的关注对象！"/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "那么……你是搬来你祖父的老房子。#$b#那是间很好的屋子……很有“乡土味”。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport move 0 -1 2000/pause 3000/speak Robin "乡土味？真是个糟糕的形容词……$4#$b#“顽固”还差不多。$4"/faceDirection Lewis 3 true/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1600/textAboveHead Lewis "太无礼了！"/showFrame Lewis 24/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Robin 2 true/pause 100/animate Robin false true 100 32 33/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/showFrame Lewis 12/stopAnimation Robin/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Lewis "别听她说的，@。她只是想诱惑你购买她的房屋升级服务。$u"/showFrame Lewis 12/showFrame Robin 19/shake Robin 800/pause 1200/showFrame Robin 0/pause 600/animate Robin false true 300 34 35/textAboveHead Robin "嗯。"/pause 1500/speak Lewis "话说……你赶了那么远的路一定很累了。你该去休息下了。#$b#明天你得到镇上走走认识些人。#$b#镇民们都很想认识你。"/move Lewis 4 0 1 true/viewport move 1 0 2000/pause 3000/proceedPosition Lewis/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "哦，差点忘了。如果你有想出售的东西，放在这个盒子里就行。我每晚都会过来收走。#$b#那么……祝你好运！"/pause 300/move Lewis 8 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 0/stopAnimation Robin/advancedMove Robin false 0 1 2 0 0 -1 5 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound rooster/pause 1000/end beginGame
